metadata.title: CVE-2012-2358 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Moodle 2.0.x before 2.0.9, 2.1.x before 2.1.6, and 2.2.x before 2.2.3allows remote authenticated users to bypass an activity's read-only stateand modify the database by leveraging the student role and editing databaseactivity entries that already exist.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2358` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: moodle package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
